items.sentence: Tom opened the door and held it open for Mary.
Tom opened the door to the interrogation room.
Tom pretended not to know anything about Mary.
Tom tried to make the best of a bad situation.
I hope to have that sort of opportunity again.
Why would Tom have any problem making friends?
I don\'t play the piano as often as I used to.
I don\'t really want to go to Boston with Tom.
Tom couldn\'t eat peanuts when he was a child.
Tom currently works for his father\'s company.
